summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Eighth Avenue Northeast, from Forty-fifth Street to the North Line of Dow and Tomlin's Addition to the City of Seattle, (East Forty-seventh Street) by grading the same and by constructing concrete walks thereon, in accordance with the prayer of the majority petition, being File No. 31828 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
